golden_diagnosis: Neonatal Marfan syndrome,Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Marfan syndrome
2. Ehlers-Danlos syndrome
3. Scoliosis
4. Osteogenesis imperfecta
5. Scheuermann's osteochondritis dissecans
6. Neurological disorders (e.g. cerebellar atrophy)
7. Neuromuscular disorders (e.g. muscular dystrophy)
8. Spinal cord abnormalities
9. Infectious diseases (e.g. osteomyelitis)
10. Connective tissue disorders
